suncertify.db

Interface DatabaseMetaData


  • public interface DatabaseMetaData
    The DatabaseMetaData interface defines the variables for indexing an array of Strings denoting a single record representing a contractor in the application database.

    It also defines some values providing the scope for the validation and verification of some fields of a contractor record.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Augustine Ogundimu

    • Field Detail

      • NAME_IDX

        static final int NAME_IDX
        This is the index for accessing the NAME attribute from an array of String objects denoting a contractor record.

        This NAME attribute represents the official name of the contractor denoted in a record.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MIN_NAME_FIELD_SIZE

        static final int MIN_NAME_FIELD_SIZE
        This is the minimum width of the name display field in the application main GUI.

      • LOCATION_IDX

        static final int LOCATION_IDX
        This is the index for accessing the LOCATION attribute from an array of String objects denoting a contractor record.

        This LOCATION attribute represents the locale of the contractor denoted by a record.

      • SPECIALITIES_IDX

        static final int SPECIALITIES_IDX
        This is the index for accessing the SPECIALITIES attribute from an array of String objects denoting a contractor record.

        The SPECIALITIES attribute represents areas of specialities of the contractor denoted by a record.

      • SIZE_IDX

        static final int SIZE_IDX
        This is the index for accessing the SIZE attribute from an array of String objects denoting a contractor record.

        The SIZE attribute represents the personnel size of the contractor denoted by a record.

      • RATE_IDX

        static final int RATE_IDX
        This is the index for accessing the RATE attribute from an array of String objects denoting a contractor record.

        The RATE attribute denotings the hourly rate charged by the contrator denoted by a record.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OWNER_IDX

        static final int OWNER_IDX
        This is the index for accessing the OWNER attribute from an array of String objects denoting a contractor record.

        The OWNER attribute is the 8 digit numerical value denoting the identification number of the customer currently employing the contractor represented by a record. This attribute is blank when the contractor is not currently employed by any customer.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
